lead_paragraph: Michael Jordan, Bugs Bunny and friends are returning to the court, and theaters, to mark the 20th anniversary of "Space Jam."

headline.main: Michael Jordan's 'Space Jam' Returning to Theaters
headline.print_headline: Michael Jordan's 'Space Jam' Returning to Theaters
